name: Symbio-tech
description:
ControlsWASDMovementSpacebarShield bash

Equipped with a shield, you must keep your nexus alive as hordes of enemies come towards you! 

Defend your nexus as it moves around collecting cores, using your shield to destroy any enemies and projectiles that come your way. 

Make use of upgrades in the shop to increase your movement speed, add an ability to your shield, and more!

Made for Ludum Dare 46
